title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre

metadata.description: The oceanic eddy parameter information was prepared for 24 years (1993 – 2016) over Bay of Bengal using AVISO.

rows: Science product of eddy parameters over Bay of Bengal.
Characterizing Ocean Eddy activities in the Bay of Bengal using Altimeter data

The oceanic eddy parameter information over Bay of Bengal was prepared for 24 years (1993 – 2016) using AVISO merged and gridded satellite altimeter sea surface height (SSH) data. SSH anomaly at 7-day interval having special resolution of 0.25o has been used for present study.
M. Jishad, OSD/AOSG/EPSA, SAC (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6117. Email: jishadm@sac.isro.gov.in
Altimter, sea surface height, Oceanic eddy, Bay of Bengal, Cyclonic and anti-cyclonic
Jishad M, Rashmi Sharma and Neeraj Agarwal, Space Applications Centre (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India
Mesoscale oceanic eddies have been identified and tracked in weekly merged altimeter product of Sea Surface Height (SSH) in the Bay of Bengal during the period 1993-2016.
M. Jishad, OSD/AOSG/EPSA, SAC (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6117. Email: jishadm@sac.isro.gov.in
Scientist/Engineer, OSD/AOSG/EPSA, SAC (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6117. Email: jishadm@sac.isro.gov.in
Vertical Extent (minimumValue, maximumValue, unitOfMeasure, vertical datum)

time(time): units = "days since 1950-1-1 00:00:00" : calendar = "Gregorian"; EddyNumber(EddyNumber): “Number of the eddy”; flag(flag): "1 for anticyclonic and 2 for cyclonic"; eddy_id(time, EddyNumber, flag): “eddy id number”; cent_lat(time, EddyNumber, flag): Eddy centre latitude : units = "degree_north"; cent_lon(time, EddyNumber, flag):Eddy centre longitude : units = "degree_east"; amp_ed(time, EddyNumber, flag):Amplitude of the eddy : units = "cm"; sca_ed(time, EddyNumber, flag):Scale of the eddy : units = "km"; are_ed(time, EddyNumber, flag): Area of the eddy : units = "km^2";
Longitude: 78OE to 100O E Latitude : 5ON to 25O N
Longitude : 78OE to 100O E Latitude : 5ON to 25O N Resolution : 0.25 O
Based on input AVISO data from 1993-2016 (24 years)
Online download of data files in NetCDF format and images in GIF format
Level 4 (Data product derived from The weakly gridded map of Absolute Dynamic Topography data)
